pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, August 16, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, August 16, 2016:

Bridgetown, Nova Scotia

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with the Premier of Nova Scotia, Stephen McNeil, and Member of Parliament Colin Fraser. A media availability will follow.

Jubilee Park
232 Granville Street
Bridgetown, Nova Scotia

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.


New Glasgow, Nova Scotia

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a community BBQ with Member of Parliament Sean Fraser.

Glasgow Square
155 Glasgow Street
New Glasgow, Nova Scotia

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:00 p.m.


Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Prince Edward Island, Wade MacLauchlan.

Charlottetown Airport
250 Maple Hills Avenue
Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:30 p.m.


4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will be mainstreeting with Member of Parliament Sean Casey in downtown Charlottetown.

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.
  • Media should report to the 2016 sculpture at the Queenâ€™s Warf


5:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Old Home Week events with the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food, Lawrence MacAulay, and Member of Parliament Sean Casey.

Old Home Week Exhibition Grounds
21 Exhibition Drive
Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 4:45 p.m.


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
